title: Wheat in Whitehorse  how climate change helps feed Canada s remote regions

content: WINNIPEG  Manitoba OTTAWA  Reuters    After failing to grow wheat in Canadas subarctic Yukon territory   years ago  farmer Steve Mackenzie Grieve gave it another shot in     Thanks to longer summers  he has reaped three straight harvests  This spring he    chars
